about-description.part1: This site was developed as part of a project to study and demonstrate the use of APIs, using public APIs from NASA. The goal is to explore how these interfaces can be integrated to provide data about space, images astronomical and scientific events in an accessible form.
about-description.part2: This project seeks, in addition to offering interesting content, improve knowledge about the implementation of APIs in web environments.
